reviews.review: Best movie I have ever seen period, just blown away from all the characters and storyline to fit in just over 2 hour movie. Seen it twice and willing to watch it again
my most anticipated flick of the year finally paid off! HELL YEAH!
so much action I loved it but the ending wasabit weird
Remarkably well handled with such a large cast of main characters. As always, Marvel hits all the good spots with this one. I particularly loved the humor.

Muchos huecos de trama y aunque sea una historia basada en un genero llamado "tiras comicas" se espera que tenga mas coherencia que una pelicula de Bay. La historia no es original, es una idea muy vieja, incluso Issac Asimov, escritor de ciencia ficcion lo dijo hace 75 años, eliminar mitad de la humanidad para que sobrevivan el resto. UNa buena idea mal ejecutada en esta pelicula.
It just kind of dragged. None of the action seemed meaningful. Just a below average movie.

This movie had a lot of amazing camera angles, transitions, and color. At the beginning of the film when they show all of the bodies of the people of Asgard, it focuses on each individual person as they walk by them. It adds to the intensity of it all and the overall sadness of it. Infinity War smashed box office records. So I would say it is extremely popular. 
The moral of the movie to me was "Who and what are you willing to personally sacrifice to accomplish your goal?" Throughout the whole entire movie characters struggle with having to sacrifice certain people or things to achieve their end goal. First Heimdall sacrifices his own life to save Hulk. Then Loki sacrifices himself and the tesseract for Thor. Iron man leaves Earth to save Dr Strange. Groot cuts off his arm to save Thor. Thor almost dies to create the Stormbreaker. Gamora gives up the soul stone for Nebula. Thanos sacrifices Gamora for the soul stone. Dr Strange gives the time stone to Thanos to save Tony. Wanda kills vision so Thanos doesn't get the mind stone, which was in vain. Then at the end young Gamora asks Thanos "Is it done?" To which he responds "Yes" "What did it cost?" "Everything"
	The main character in this movie is essentially Thanos. It is all about how he is trying to get the infinity stones. His internal conflict would have to be pride. Thinking that he knows what the universe needs, and refusing to see it any other way. The external conflict is basically everyone trying to stop Thanos.
Kudos to the director to able to pull this off with so many stars and super heroes involve. Everybody gets their fair share in the limelight. Really excited about the next upcoming installment.

O problema de Anagers - Guerra Infinita é que o filme parece ser vítima da quantidade de filmes da Marvel no mercado. São tantos e que usam a mesma fórmula, que quando este chegou, e que deveria ser o ápice de todo planejamento do MU, transformou-se numa serie de "nens". Nem cativa, nem comove, nem faz rir, nem...
Amazing time! It's incredible that the Russo brothers managed to not only balance all of these characters, but also keep of their respective tones intact.
